item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @bladex_demon bladex demon
item.description:
@bladex_demon wrote:

well… lovly 2h, if you have the time and dedication to make a server then you can do practically whatever you want on a server so the answer to this question is yes…you can make yourself owner on your server. you can do this by opening your characters folder finding your username/game save and opening it (requires notepad)…then you will see “rights = 0” (this is what defines an admin from a mod or owner etc.) just change the “0” to…
mod = 1
admin = 2
owner = 3
hidden admin = 4
I hope that you learned something from this and that it answered your question.

Read full topic
